member.name: IWbemObjectTextSrc.GetText
member.summary: The IWbemObjectTextSrc.GetText method creates a textual representation of an object; for example, an XML representation.
member.param: Reference to the object to be represented in text format. This parameter cannot be NULL.

param.name: uObjTextFormat
param.para: Definition of the text format used to represent the object. For more information about valid values for this parameter, see Remarks.
Use the DTD that corresponds to CIM DTD version 2.0.
Use the WMI DTD that corresponds to CIM DTD version 2.0. Using this value enables WMI-specific extensions, such as embedded objects or scope.

param.name: pCtx
param.para: Optional. Context object for the operation. The context object can be used to specify whether certain parts of the object are represented in text; for example, whether to include qualifiers in the textual representation. The context object takes the following optional values.
If TRUE, only locally defined properties and methods are present in the resulting XML. The default is FALSE.
If TRUE, the qualifiers of classes, instances, properties, and methods are included in the output. The default is FALSE.

item.description:
0
A CLASS or INSTANCE element is created depending on whether the object is a class or instance.

param.para: If TRUE, system properties, like __NAMESPACE, are absent in the output. The default is FALSE.
If TRUE, the class origin attribute is set on PROPERTY and METHOD elements. The default is FALSE.

member.param: Textual representation of the object. User must free the string using SysFreeString when finished with strText.
member.returns: This method returns an HRESULT that indicates the status of the method call. The following list lists the value contained within an HRESULT.

member.name: IWbemObjectTextSrc
member.summary: TheIWbemObjectTextSrc interface is used to translate instances to and from differing text formats.
